message:
Chocolatey lets you install any Windows application (in its gallery) using the command line. It will download and install the application. That easy.
Chocolatey is built on top of NuGet.
Very cool.
http://chocolatey.org/
name: Chocolatey Gallery
caption: chocolatey.org
description: To install chocolatey now, open a command prompt and paste the text from the box below and press enter. Click to copy the text below to clipboard.
